ul.li: Commodity Quote Sample - Provides instructions on how to run the Commodity Quote sample
MTOM Sample Guide - Demonstrates how to write an MTOM client
STS Sample Guide - Demonstrates Security Token Service included with WSF/Java
JSON Sample Guide - Demonstrates how to write a JSON client
Mail Sample Guide - Demonstrates how to invoke a service using Mail transport
MEX Sample Guide - Demonstrates WSO2 WSF/Java's ability to enable services to support WS-MetadataExchange and how to use MEX to retrieve metadata from MEX supported services
Xfer Sample Guide - Demonstrates WSO2 WSF/Java's ability to enable services to support WS-Transfer
Client API Sample Guide - Demonstrates all types of clients which are supported by Axis2.
